The Big Bang - reason why we were born

In the age of digital and AI revolution, we understand that every organization is going through the following 3 pain points.

  1. People costs are going higher and higher. Be it FTE (Full Time Employees) or Contractors/Vendors.
  2. The growth of no-code/low-code technologies/products/platforms are on the rise and thereby causing hard dependencies.
  3. Technological sophistication is also going up with Cloud Adoption.
  4. Organizations are being bought into more complex ways to doing things when simple techniques exist.

We realized that these problems will only grow as time proceeds and cause pain for businesses to evolve, scale and be profitable. Thus, we were born with an aim to solve these pain points.

Who are we

Founded in the year 2022 and incorporated in India, we are bunch of highly experienced industry professionals coming from various backgrounds like Business Consulting, Architecture & Design, Application Development, DevOps and Delivery Services who got together to form this amazing new organization named "Bitmoq Technologies".

We bring more than 18 to 20 years of industry experience and wealth of knowledge to help our customers achieve their objectives with maximum value gain.

WHY BITMOQ?

INDUSTRY EXPERIENCE

We bring more than 18 to 20 years of industry experience working with multiple technologies. Our skills and experience reflect in our work deliverable. You can count on us.

FUNCTIONAL AND TECHNICAL ACCUMEN

Our approach to problem solving starts with functional followed by technical + "Less is More" principle at the heart of solutioning.

AFFORDABLE SERVICES

Our motto is to deliver our services at a cost that is affordable to our customers with the use of technology, automation and AI.

UNBIASED & VALUE DRIVEN

We do not have any revenue or profit sharing with any technology companies/platforms/providers nor are we under the influence of the hungry investor. Hence, we are not here to up sell or cross sell any products. Delivering value for you is our utmost priority.

Every journey to success starts with a single step.
